sentences.en: A proctor will collect ( or gather ) the examination papers at the end of the hour.
sentences.cn: 学监将于一小时之后收 ( 或 ) 考卷.

sentences.en: A proctor's assistant at Oxford University or Cambridge University.
sentences.cn: 牛津大学或剑桥大学里学监的助手.

sentences.en: Although disabled by polio during the Second World War, Proctor was also a first-rate helmsman.
sentences.cn: 二战期间尽管身患小儿麻痹症，普罗克特仍不失为一流的舵手。

sentences.en: I'm in a good routine right now, Proctor said.
sentences.cn: [我现在的日程排得很好.]洛克特表示.

sentences.en: It was a concern that [ the suspension ] could impact a big series, Proctor said.
sentences.cn: [ 我本来也有些担心会影响到重要系列战. ] 洛克特如此表示.

sentences.en: One student who arrived four minutes late in 2007 was turned away, even though she and her mother knelt before the exam proctor, begging for leniency.
sentences.cn: 2007年高考中，一位考生迟到了四分钟就被拒绝入场。 虽然她和妈妈在监考老师面前下跪哀求，最终也未能进入考场。

sentences.en: Proctor & am Gamble is a large personal product conglomerate.
sentences.cn: 宝洁 公司是一家生产个人卫生用品的大集团公司.

sentences.en: Proctor and Gamble has significant distribution power because of the strength of their brand name.
sentences.cn: 麦当劳品牌名称的巨大优势使公司在世界各地不断建立新市场.

sentences.en: Proctor did so in response to two earlier plays in the contest.
sentences.cn: 天天P这样 的举动是回应本场比赛两个早先发生的事情.

sentences.en: Proctor Test Set is a tool used by Telco personnel to diagnose problems with phone lines.
sentences.cn: 代理测试集是电讯工作人员用来检测电话线路问题的一种工具.

sentences.en: Should he perceive Colonel Proctor, we could not prevent a collision which might have terrible results.
sentences.cn: 这会儿,他要是看到了普洛克托上校, 我们就没法拦阻他们了,那样事情就会糟了.

sentences.en: Stamp Proctor and Phileas Fogg recognized each other at once.
sentences.cn: 斯汤姆·普洛克托和斐利亚·福克两个人一见面马上就认出来了.

sentences.en: The proctor demanded ( of him ) his reason for his conduct.
sentences.cn: 学监 要他说出他的行为的理由.

sentences.en: The proctor demanded of him his reason for doing so.
sentences.cn: 学监要他说出做这事的理由。

sentences.en: Torre said Proctor may have been too pumped up, trying to overthrow his pitches.
sentences.cn: 老爹说天天P也许投高了, 尝试把球投的太高了.

words.tran_cn: 代理人之职；学监之职位或任期
检察官；代理人；行政长官

trans.tran_en: someone who watches students in an examination to make sure that they do not cheat
